entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 20. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 9 May 2023
